text:
I just got back from s2pizzabar. I was looking forward to it for a few days and I was not disappointed! I went with a friend. We ordered the <Soppressata> and the <Four Cheese with bacon>. (See photos I posted)

First off, the <Four Cheese pizza> was amazing! I was hooked as soon as I took that first bite! Such a perfect combination of cheeses! The <bacon>, when I tried a few pieces that fell off the <pizza>, was very good and had a nice smoky flavor. Though, I don't think it added anything to the <four cheese pizza>; I couldn't taste it above the cheeses.  My friend and I agreed that this <pizza> would complement nicely with a <red wine>.

The <Soppressata> was very good as well. We both enjoyed it, but had a hard time returning to it after we tried the awesome <Four Cheese pizza!> 

I really enjoy the <wood-fired pizzas> and I will definitely return in the future!
